org.mini2Dx.core.controller.xbox360

Interface Xbox360ControllerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MdxControllerListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Xbox360ControllerAdapter, Xbox360UiInput

    public interface Xbox360ControllerListener
extends MdxControllerListener
    Input listener interface for Xbox360Controllers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean buttonDown(Xbox360Controller controller, Xbox360Button button)
      Called when a button is pressed down
      boolean buttonUp(Xbox360Controller controller, Xbox360Button button)
      Called when a button is released
      void disconnected(Xbox360Controller controller)
      Called when a controller disconnects
      boolean leftStickXMoved(Xbox360Controller controller, float value)
      Called when left stick moves along its X axis
      boolean leftStickYMoved(Xbox360Controller controller, float value)
      Called when left stick moves along its Y axis
      boolean leftTriggerMoved(Xbox360Controller controller, float value)
      Called when the left trigger is moved
      boolean rightStickXMoved(Xbox360Controller controller, float value)
      Called when right stick moves along its X axis
      boolean rightStickYMoved(Xbox360Controller controller, float value)
      Called when left stick moves along its Y axis
      boolean rightTriggerMoved(Xbox360Controller controller, float value)
      Called when the right trigger is moved

    • Method Detail

      • disconnected

        void disconnected(Xbox360Controller controller)
        Called when a controller disconnects
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from

      • buttonDown

        boolean buttonDown(Xbox360Controller controller,
                   Xbox360Button button)
        Called when a button is pressed down
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        button - The button that was pressed
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners

      • buttonUp

        boolean buttonUp(Xbox360Controller controller,
                 Xbox360Button button)
        Called when a button is released
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        button - The button that was released
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners

      • leftTriggerMoved

        boolean leftTriggerMoved(Xbox360Controller controller,
                         float value)
        Called when the left trigger is moved
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        value - ~0f when released, ~1f when pressed
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners

      • rightTriggerMoved

        boolean rightTriggerMoved(Xbox360Controller controller,
                          float value)
        Called when the right trigger is moved
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        value - ~0f when released, ~1f when pressed
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners

      • leftStickXMoved

        boolean leftStickXMoved(Xbox360Controller controller,
                        float value)
        Called when left stick moves along its X axis
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        value - ~-1f at left, ~0f at center, ~1f at right (values may never be accurate due to dead zones, apply a DeadZone to the controller instance to correct this)
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners

      • leftStickYMoved

        boolean leftStickYMoved(Xbox360Controller controller,
                        float value)
        Called when left stick moves along its Y axis
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        value - ~-1f at top, ~0f at center, ~1f at bottom (values may never be accurate due to dead zones, apply a DeadZone to the controller instance to correct this)
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners

      • rightStickXMoved

        boolean rightStickXMoved(Xbox360Controller controller,
                         float value)
        Called when right stick moves along its X axis
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        value - ~-1f at left, ~0f at center, ~1f at right (values may never be accurate due to dead zones, apply a DeadZone to the controller instance to correct this)
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners

      • rightStickYMoved

        boolean rightStickYMoved(Xbox360Controller controller,
                         float value)
        Called when left stick moves along its Y axis
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        value - ~-1f at top, ~0f at center, ~1f at bottom (values may never be accurate due to dead zones, apply a DeadZone to the controller instance to correct this)
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners
